Question: A spring is stretched 10 cm by a force of 3 N. A mass of 2 kg is hung from the spring and is also attached to a viscous damper that exerts a force of 3 N when the velocity of the mass is 5 m/s. If the mass is pulled down 5 cm below its equilibrium position and given an initial downward velocity of 10 cm/s and regard the initial velocity as the positive direction, determine its position u at any time t. Determine the distance between its position after 0.1s and equilibrium position in inch. Keep four significant digit number in answer.
